VoidUI_IB_remove_empty_desc:
Should we hide all custom infoboxes
that displays a 0 value?
VoidUI_IB_jokers_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for Jokers?
VoidUI_IB_jokers_kills_desc: Should we display how many lives Joker has taken out?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for Sentry Guns?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_kills_desc: Should we display how many lives Sentry gun has taken out?
VoidUI_IB_timers_desc: Should we display timers like Drills, saws etc.?
VoidUI_IB_civs_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of Civies on the map?
VoidUI_IB_enemies_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of Enemies on the map?
VoidUI_IB_gage_packs_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of Gage Packages on the map?
VoidUI_IB_kills_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of lives taken out by you?
VoidUI_IB_lootbags_infobox_desc: Should we add Infoboxes for amount of bags on the map?
VoidUI_IB_debug_desc: Settings that can help you gain some more information for reporting issues etc.
VoidUI_IB_debug_show_missing_id_desc:
If you enable this option, mod will print on chat (visible only to you)
missing ID for unit interactions
VoidUI_IB_debug_timer_desc:
Should mod print on chat (visible only to you)
timer ID that was just created?
VoidUI_IB_timer_Water_pump_desc: This timer is used in The Bomb: Forest
VoidUI_IB_timer_Water_desc: This timer is used in Counterfeit and Golden Grin Casino
VoidUI_IB_timer_Ink_desc: This timer is used on Counterfeit
VoidUI_IB_timer_Paper_desc: This timer is used on Counterfeit
VoidUI_IB_timer_Printer_desc: This timer is used on Counterfeit
VoidUI_IB_timer_Helicopter_desc: This timer is used on Hotline Miami day 2
VoidUI_IB_timer_Barcode_scanner_desc: This timer is used on Hotline Miami day 1
VoidUI_IB_timer_Breaching_desc: This timer is used on Hotline Miami day 1
VoidUI_IB_timer_Tape_loop_desc: Should we display security camera loop timer?
VoidUI_IB_timer_Fuel_desc:
Should we display this timer? 
Currently used on Beneath the Mountain and Alaskan Deal
VoidUI_IB_special_kills_infobox_desc: Adds a kill counter for Special Enemies
VoidUI_IB_debug_jokers_desc: Will print some info about jokers on chat
VoidUI_IB_special_enemies_infobox_desc:
Should we add Special Enemies infobox? 
When both Special Enemies and Enemies infoboxes are turned on, 
enemies infobox will display amount of non-special enemies.
VoidUI_IB_ShowOnlyOwnedSentry_desc: With that option enabled, mod will track only your own Sentry Guns.
VoidUI_IB_ShowOnlyOwnedJokers_desc: With that option enabled, mod will track only your own Joker minions.
VoidUI_IB_row_size_desc: How many infoboxes should be in one row.
VoidUI_IB_timer_row_size_desc: How many timers should be in one row.
VoidUI_IB_joker_health_type_desc: How you want mod to display Joker health as?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_health_type_desc: How you want mod to display Sentry health as?
VoidUI_IB_sentry_ammo_type_desc: How you want mod to display Sentry ammo as?
VoidUI_IB_collectables_desc:
Count collectables in infobox? You can toggle on/off which one you want to display.
Empty ones (x0) will be removed regardless of the option 'Remove Empty'
VoidUI_IB_collectables_priority_desc: Used for sorting. The higer priority will be displayed above the lower priority
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Money_desc: Should we count all small moneys bundles and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Keycard_desc: Should we count all keycards and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Planks_desc: Should we count all planks and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_MuriaticAcid_desc: Should we count all muriatic acids and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_HydrogenChloride_d: Should we count all hydrogen chlorines and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_CausticSoda_desc: Should we count all caustic sodas and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Crowbar_desc: Should we count all crowbars and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Jewellery_desc: Should we count all Jewellery and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Ink_desc: Should we count all Inks and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Paper_desc: Should we count all Papers and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_BlowTorch_desc: Should we count all Blow Torches and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Thermite_desc: Should we count all Thermites and put that value inside Infobox?
VoidUI_IB_row_one_only_one_priority_titl: Only Highest priority next to original VoidUI boxes
VoidUI_IB_row_one_only_one_priority_desc:
With this setting enabled, it will put only Highest priority boxes near VoidUI's original boxes. 
Lower priorities will be displayed below them. 
With this option disabled even lower priorities will be placed near the VoidUI's original boxes.
NOTE: This setting gets overwritten by 'Vanilla boxes always above custom Infoboxes'
VoidUI_IB_row_one_for_vanilla_title: Vanilla boxes always above custom Infoboxes
VoidUI_IB_row_one_for_vanilla_desc: With this option turned on, no Infobox added with this mod will be placed at the same level as VoidUI's original infobox.
VoidUI_IB_p_one_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_two_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_three_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_four_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_five_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_p_six_row_size_desc: How many panels in a row can fit inside this priority?
VoidUI_IB_debug_lootbags_desc: If enabled will print carry_id and unit_id in chat for each bag added to the Infobox
VoidUI_IB_sentry_remember_kills_desc:
While this setting is true, game will remember how much kills your sentry had when you picked it up,
And will set this value as a kill counter when you place it again.
VoidUI_IB_missing_dependency_desc:
Hey, I am soo glad you've installed my VoidUI Infoboxes addon! 

Unfortunately, you don't have VoidUI mod installed, and it is required in order for Infoboxes to work. Please either install VoidUI manually (PAYDAY 2/mods folder)
Or uninstall VoidUI Infobox addon.
Have a nice day!
VoidUI_IB_skills_desc: Turn on/off skills, manage their settings when turned on etc.
VoidUI_IB_Inspire_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_BloodThirst_desc: Allows track of Blood Thirst damage bonus
VoidUI_IB_BloodThirst_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_Berserker_desc: Allows track of Berserker damage bonus
VoidUI_IB_Berserker_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_AcedBerserker_desc: Allows track of Aced Berserker damage bonus
VoidUI_IB_AcedBerserker_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_Overkill_desc: Allows track of Overkill damage bonus
VoidUI_IB_Overkill_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_SixthSense_desc: Allows track of Sixth Sense skill timers
VoidUI_IB_SixthSense_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_Bulletstorm_desc: Allows track of Bulletstorm skill time
VoidUI_IB_Bulletstorm_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_ForcedFriendship_desc: Allows track of Forced Friendship skill damage reduction
VoidUI_IB_ForcedFriendship_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_MedicCombat_desc: Allows track of Combat Medic skill damage reduction
VoidUI_IB_MedicCombat_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_PainKillers_desc: Allows track of Pain Killers skill damage reduction
VoidUI_IB_PainKillers_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_QuickFix_desc: Allows track of Quick Fix skill damage reduction
VoidUI_IB_QuickFix_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_PartnersInCrime_desc: Allows track of Partners In Crime speed buff
VoidUI_IB_PartnersInCrime_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_skill_AcedPartnersInCrime_desc: Allows track of Aced Partners In Crime health buff
VoidUI_IB_AcedPartnersInCrime_priority_d: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_TotalSpeedBonus_desc: Will display current speed modifier (for 'run' state)
VoidUI_IB_xp_align_desc:
[REQUIRES Jokermon mod!!!]
Jokers XP bar/value align
VoidUI_IB_joker_xp_type_desc:
[REQUIRES Jokermon mod!!!]
Display joker's XP in percentage or as a bar?
VoidUI_IB_enemy_counter_desc:
Display separate counter for this enemy.
Toggle on/off.
VoidUI_IB_specific_special_enemies_desc: If you want to display just snipers, here's the menu for you.
VoidUI_IB_possible_loot_infobox_desc: If you want to display roughly amount of crates and other possible loot locations enable this setting.
VoidUI_IB_hud_space_desc: Here you can set how much infoboxes you want per priority in line, and some space specific settings
VoidUI_IB_jokers_desc: Sub menu for all Joker related settings.
VoidUI_IB_sentry_desc: Sub menu for all Sentry related settings.
VoidUI_IB_counters_desc: Sub menu for all Counter related settings.
VoidUI_IB_hud_assault_corner_desc: Hud space (Top right corner of the screen) settings
VoidUI_IB_Position_hud_desc:
Here you can chose in which hud part you want this infobox type to be displayed
IMPORTANT!!!
Changing this setting will only work when you have that part of a hud enabled in VoidUI settings.
In case you don't have it enabled, it will not be displayed, and the infoboxes will be displayed in the other avaible hud space.
VoidUI_IB_Skills_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_SeparateBagged_desc: If true, will display string "{amount_unbagged} | {amount_bagged}" instead of just "{amount}"
VoidUI_IB_collectable_weapon_part_desc:
This will add an collectable counter for the titled weapon part 
[It's used in Ranch heist]
VoidUI_IB_timer_arrest_cooldown_desc:
This is a cooldown for Cop's Arrest mechanic. During the cooldown, cops won't hesitate to shot you. 
This timer works only in stealth, and you better wait for it to end before you get spotted by a cop,
If you do get spotted while this cooldown is ticking down, guards WILL shot you and ruin your stealth!
VoidUI_IB_skill_UnseenStrike_desc: Allows track of Unseen Strike critical hit chance buff
VoidUI_IB_support_desc:
By clicking this button, a web page will open where you can support me on Ko-Fi.
I hope you enjoy my work, and I hope you will consider donating to my projects.
Thank you!
VoidUI_IB_show_unlocked_desc: Show trackers for achievements that you've already unlocked?
VoidUI_IB_Achievements_desc: Turn on Achievement tracking Infoboxes? There's not soo many achievements supported yet, but I'm working on it!
VoidUI_IB_achievements_desc:
This is a sub menu for all achievements related settings.
It can track some of the achievements avaible on the map you're playing.
NOTE: Timed achievements can be toggled on/off in the Timers submenu.
VoidUI_IB_Achievements_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_timer_Elf_desc:
This is a timer for the Elf's work on Santa's Workshop. 
When this timer finishes, elf will stop making the present and you'll be able to pick it up (and secure it later)
VoidUI_IB_timer_Power_desc: Timer for Power related stuff (Currently only used in Shaclethorne Mansion heist)
VoidUI_IB_timer_minutes_and_seconds_desc:
If true, will display time in minutes and seconds, if false, will display time in seconds only. 
The time will be displayed in the format of "mm:ss" or "ss".
VoidUI_IB_perks_menu_desc: This menu contains settings for all of the supported Perkdeck timers and counters.
VoidUI_IB_perks_desc: Enable Perkdeck infoboxes? There's not soo many Perkdecks supported yet, but I'm working on it!
VoidUI_IB_priority_desc: Higher priorities will make infoboxes go higher than lower priorities.
VoidUI_IB_ArmorerInvulnerable_desc: Tracks the Invulnerable buff from Armorer perkdeck.
VoidUI_IB_PerkDeck_option_desc: All options for this perkdeck trackers are inside.
VoidUI_IB_BruteStrength_desc:
Track CrewChief's Brute Strength bonus card? 
This card adds an 8% damage reduction to you and all of the other players in the lobby.
This effect gets doubled for you when your health is below 50%.
VoidUI_IB_BruteStrenghtTrackForCCIC_desc:
When enabled, the tracker will be enabled even if you're not the CrewChief.
Due to the fact that it's an TeamBonus, you might want to have that enabled soo you know you're
playing with someone with CrewChief perkdeck.
VoidUI_IB_MarathonManStamina_desc:
Track CrewChief's Marathon Man bonus card? 
This card adds an 50% more stamina to you and all of the other players in the lobby.
VoidUI_IB_MarathonManStaminaTrackForCCIC:
When enabled, the tracker will be enabled even if you're not the CrewChief.
Due to the fact that it's an TeamBonus, you might want to have that enabled soo you know you're
playing with someone with CrewChief perkdeck.
VoidUI_IB_MarathonManDmgDampener_desc:
Track CrewChief's Marathon Man bonus card?
This card adds an 6% damage reduction to you when you're within medium range of an enemy.
VoidUI_IB_HostageSituationCounter_desc: Track Hostage Situation counter? It will show how many hostages you have and how much you need to get the maximum bonus.
VoidUI_IB_HostageSituationCounterTrackFo:
When enabled, the tracker will be enabled even if you're not the CrewChief.
Due to the fact that it's an TeamBonus, you might want to have that enabled soo you know you're
playing with someone with CrewChief perkdeck.
VoidUI_IB_GorillaRegen_desc:
Track Muscle's Regen bonus card? (Timer) 
This card regens 3% of your life every 5 seconds.
VoidUI_IB_debug_buffs_title: Print debug info for buffs on chat
VoidUI_IB_debug_buffs_desc: Print debug info for buffs on chat
VoidUI_IB_LifeDrain_desc: Track Infiltrator's Life Drain bonus card? (Cooldown)
VoidUI_IB_AnarchistInvulnerable_desc: Anarchist Invulnerable buff time and cooldown tracker
VoidUI_IB_send_failed_warning_desc: Send a message to the chat when the achievement is failed?
VoidUI_IB_AutoShrug_desc: Track Stoic's Calm card? (Cooldown) - It's tracking a time in which when you're not taking any damage, all pending damage will be nullified.
VoidUI_IB_MedSup_desc: Track Gambler's Medical Supplies bonus card? (Cooldown)
VoidUI_IB_InfMeleeStack_desc: Track Infiltrator's Melee Stacking bonus card? (Cooldown)
VoidUI_IB_PrintUnknownTimers_desc:
Please keep this option enabled and help me filtering all the timers in the game.
If you find a timer that is not being tracked, please send an issue report on the mod's GitHub page.
VoidUI_IB_hud_custom_hud_space_desc:
Here you can setup your own static HUD part where Infoboxes can be placed.
Use with causion - it is NOT checking for any overleaping, and it will stay in given position, it's not dynamic and will not move at all.
You can set priorities to 0 in order to remove some rows,
although you won't be able to spawn Infoboxes with priority that has rowsize 0!
It can also overflow with infoboxes - you can only fill the given slots, the rest will not spawn
Overflowing infoboxes can be moved to another HUD with specific settings.
VoidUI_IB_show_debug_position_desc:
When this setting is turned on, a plane will be shown on the screen, showing the position of the HUD space.

It will also show avaible slots for InfoBoxes.
It's usefull for positioning your own Infobox space.
VoidUI_IB_p_hud_space_x_desc:
X position (Left / Right)
It's a % value from the left side of the screen.
0 = Left side of the screen
100 = Right side of the screen
VoidUI_IB_p_hud_space_y_desc:
X position (Top / Bottom)
It's a % value from the top of the screen.
0 = Top side of the screen
100 = Bottom side of the screen
VoidUI_IB_align_hud_desc: Align spawned Infoboxes to the left or right, top or bottom of the panel.
VoidUI_IB_dont_change_y_ib_desc:
When turned on, it won't change the Y position of the Infoboxes, only the X position.
This is usefull when you want to have Infoboxes placed always in the same row.
It will place pririority boxes exactly at their spot,
and will not move them to the bottom/top of the panel even if there's a space avaible.
VoidUI_IB_overflow_to_hud_desc:
When there's not enough space for all the Infoboxes, they will overflow to the next HUD space.
This setting will tell the mod where to move them.
"Don't spawn" option will make overflowed infoboxes not appear at all.
VoidUI_IB_timer_MiaCokeDestroy_desc:
It's used in the Hotline Miami heist, day 2.
It will show you how much time do you have left untill thugs destroy the coke.
VoidUI_IB_timer_RatVanFlee_desc:
It's used in the Cook Off heist.
It will show you how much time do you have left untill the van flees.
VoidUI_IB_timer_Bridge_desc:
It's used in the Goat Simulator heist.
It will show you how much time do you have left untill the bridge closes.
VoidUI_IB_timer_BFD_desc:
It's used in the Golden Grin Casino heist.
It will show you how much time do you have left untill the BFD finishes
VoidUI_IB_timer_Escape_desc: Used in some heists to show how much time do you have left untill the escape is avaible.
VoidUI_IB_AnimateBorders_desc: Animate the borders of the Infoboxes? It will make it soo the border slowly disappears/appears the less time on the timer is left.
VoidUI_IB_ReverseAnimation_desc:
It will reverse the animation of the borders.
It will make it soo the border slowly appears the less time on the timer is left.
VoidUI_IB_timer_Fire_desc: Fire timer, used in several heists.
VoidUI_IB_timer_Assemble_desc: Assemble timer, currently used in Biker heist [Day 1]
VoidUI_IB_timer_EMP_desc: EMP timer, currently used in Boiling Point heist.
VoidUI_IB_timer_Plane_desc: Plane timer, currently used in Greenbridge and Go Bank heists.
VoidUI_IB_collectable_Lrm_Keycard_desc: This is a keycard used in The Lost Tapes /aka/ Bad For Business event.
VoidUI_IB_FloatingJokerBoxes_desc:
When enabled, infoboxes will float above joker's head (Similar to WayPoints).
Note: With this settings toggled on, the HUD setting will not do anything.
VoidUI_IB_FloatingSentryBoxes_desc:
When enabled, infoboxes will float at Sentry location (Similar to WayPoints).
Note: With this settings toggled on, the HUD setting will not do anything.
VoidUI_IB_FloatingETimerBoxes_desc:
When enabled, infoboxes will float at Element location (Similar to WayPoints), or digital counter unit location.
This is not tested and might create a lot of visual glitches, better keep it off, unless you want to help me fixing them.
Note: With this settings toggled on, the HUD setting will not do anything.
VoidUI_IB_FloatingUTimerBoxes_desc:
When enabled, infoboxes will float at unit's (e.g. Drill) location (Similar to WayPoints).
Note: With this settings toggled on, the HUD setting will not do anything.
VoidUI_IB_timer_Pager_desc: Pager timer (A floating timer) - will display an infobox timer on the guards for their pager timers
VoidUI_IB_timer_Boat_desc: Boat timer, currently used on the Watchdogs heist [Day 2]
VoidUI_IB_trackers_desc: Track some misc values in-game that are listed below?
VoidUI_IB_track_Drama_desc:
Track Drama value?
When the tracker hits 100% you're in high drama zone, which means the game will probably force an assault.
